dict.string:
## PHPCodeCompletion .tmbundle ## Version: 1.0b5 - 2005-08-25 ## Created by Mats Persson [mats@imediatec.co.uk] ## (C) Copyright 2005 ## Licence: Free for anyone to use and distribute ## ## Inspired by and partly based on phpcc by ian@ardes.com
## NB! This command needs a reality check on what TM_CURRENT_WORD actually is. ## I know about the problem of it working on completed functions already, ## I'm just crap at greping my way out of it
${TM_PHP:=php} "$TM_BUNDLE_PATH"/bin/phpcc.InsertSnippet.php "$TM_CURRENT_WORD"
